passage.text: Hey new guy! Come and open that door, it's Alison, one of the tech's at this facility. I'm through the next room, let's have a quick chat. Just open the door ahead and see me, I'm next to the computer on your right.
So new guy guy, whatever you name is.... We got a bit of an infestation problem that needs sorting out
Go and use your pistol to take out these goddamn huge mutant ants. Union doesn't pay me enough for this shit, and its your first day so....
